name: Shape Click (golden edition)
description:
A simple clicker game. Click the shapes to get points and increase your score. It is my first game made with my own engine. My engine has a basic physics system, a particle system, a sound engine and state manager. Simple enough for now, but I am planing to improve it.

CONTROLS:
- Space: Action (Start, restart etc..).
- Left mouse button: Clicking the shapes.

MECHANICS:
- Click the shapes to increase your score and gain health.
- Health goes down when shapes despawn.
- Try to achieve the biggest score possible.

Thanks for playing!
